topic.title: Using a Custom Protocol
topic.shortdesc: A custom protocol allows you to connect Greenplum Database to a data source that cannot be accessed with the file://, gpfdist://, or gphdfs:// protocols.

body.p: Creating a custom protocol requires that you implement a set of C functions with specified interfaces, declare the functions in Greenplum Database, and then use the CREATE TRUSTED PROTOCOL command to enable the protocol in the database.
